title: A Guide to Graph Query Languages - Dgraph Blog
author: Dgraph Labs; Inc
description: Discover the power of the graph database model and how graph query languages like Cypher, Gremlin, and SPARQL simplify handling complex, interconnected data.
cntitle: 图查询语言指南 - Dgraph 博客
cndescription: 探索图数据库模型的力量，以及 Cypher、Gremlin 和 SPARQL 等图查询语言如何简化对复杂互连数据的处理。
